data.title: Bankless Academy
data.description:
[Bankless Academy](https://app.banklessacademy.com/) is on a mission: to provide the best knowledge and tools necessary for exploring web3! 🧑🏻‍🚀🚀

Our platform takes a hands-on approach to crypto education, pairing theory with practice. We believe that to understand web3, you must use web3! Our blend of interactive content, knowledge checks, and practical onchain quests make navigating the blockchain multiverse easy. **Bankless Academy is a free-to-use learning platform that guides the web3 curious.** From newcomer to adept #BanklessExplorer - our program will have you ready to navigate the world of web3.

The project continues to pioneer #antisybil efforts as one of the [first education platforms to integrate Gitcoin Passport](https://www.gitcoin.co/blog/bankless-academy-a-gitcoin-passport-case-study) - preserving the legitimacy of your education!

Currently, our learning journey covers [20 crucial topics](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons) for any Explorer, including:

- [Registering Your Web3 Username](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/registering-your-web3-username) — **featuring ENS!**
- [Bitcoin Basics](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/bitcoin-basics) — in 7 languages!
- [Wallet Basics](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/wallet-basics)
- [Web3 Security](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/web3-security)
- [Layer 2 Blockchains](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/layer-2-blockchains)
- [Managing Token Allowances](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/managing-token-allowances)
- [Staking on Ethereum](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/staking-on-ethereum)
- [Optimism Governance](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/optimism-governance) — in 6 languages!

With your support, Bankless Academy continues to provide free web3 education for all.

## Highlights

### ENS Integration

[![Explorer Profile](https://i.ibb.co/zsMKMnh/explorer-Profile.png)](https://app.banklessacademy.com/explorer/web3explorer.eth)

[25% of our users have a ENS reverse name set up](https://dune.com/didierkrux/bankless-academy-explorers), and with our new [Explorer Profile feature](https://app.banklessacademy.com/explorer/web3explorer.eth) and [ENS handbook](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/registering-your-web3-username) we're expanding that number!


### Onchain Credentials Milestone

[![Bankless Academy Badges](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rk8Vpy3lC.jpg)](https://opensea.io/collection/bankless-academy-badges)


More than [20,000 lesson badges](https://dune.com/didierkrux/bankless-academy-badges) protected by Gitcoin Passport have been minted by Bankless Explorers.


### [Bankless Academy Workshops](https://twitter.com/BanklessAcademy/status/1676989952587087872)

[![Untitled](https://i.ibb.co/rGR9ZWW/workshop.png)](https://twitter.com/BanklessAcademy/status/1775566412603383995)

In March, the Bankless Academy Squad took part in ETHBucharest, hosting its much loved **in-person workshop,** "Crypto Compass: Finding Your Path in Web3".

### [Bankless Academy multi-language support](https://twitter.com/BanklessAcademy/status/1778438100139880654)

[![Untitled](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJRIT1hgA.png)](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/bitcoin-basics)


We recently launched “Bitcoin Basics” in 6 languages, and are planning to translate all our existing lessons in Spanish 🇪🇸, Japanese 🇯🇵, Chinese 🇨🇳, French 🇫🇷, and German 🇩🇪.

## What's next for Bankless Academy?

- New and improved lesson select menu!
- “Ethereum Basics” — the last lesson in our “Essentials” curriculum.
- New Explorer Profile features.
- A keyword glossary.
- More in-person workshops at upcoming Ethereum events.
- More multi-language lessons

Your support helps Bankless Academy continue to thrive by fulfilling its mission. Through impactful learning journeys we aim to help the world #GoBankless, one Explorer at a time.

For more information and to stay connected with Bankless Academy, follow and reach out to us on:

- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/BanklessAcademy)
- [Farcaster](https://warpcast.com/~/channel/banklessacademy)
- [Lens](https://lenster.xyz/u/banklessacademy)
- [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/banklessacademy/)
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/bankless-academy/)
- [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JMeVzmycj_s)

Thank you for your continued unconditional support! 🙏

— Tetranome, DidierKrux & OrnellaWeb3
data.missionSummary: Providing Explorers with the tools and knowledge needed to 'go bankless' 🧑🏻‍🚀 🚀

data.description:
Bankless Academy is a free, open-source platform offering interactive lessons and onchain certifications to make Web3 knowledge accessible for everyone. By breaking barriers to entry with inclusive and beginner-friendly education, we empower individuals to explore and be part of the new internet.

It is a public good because itâs non-excludable and non-rivalrous. Itâs freely available to anyone without diminishing its availability to others. Bankless Academy serves the collective benefit by equipping people with tools and knowledge to contribute to and grow within the Web3 space.

Learn more and discuss Bankless Academy on discuss.octant.app.
data.title: Bankless Academy
Glo Dollar x Arbitrum DAO
data.description: We’re rallying all Web3 projects to start embedding philanthropy in their organization by integrating the Glo Dollar stablecoin in their platform and/or treasury. By doing so these organizations bring three benefits to the world: (1) directly contribute to funding basic incomes for people in extreme poverty, (2) spread the word about Glo Dollar to a bigger audience, indirectly growing basic income funding, and (3) opportunity to join the Glo Consortium to further collaborate on reducing extreme poverty. Glo Dollar is collaborating with Arbitrum DAO to bring a total of $10,000 in USDGLO in matching for organizations that embed philanthropy. Whether you're already part of the Glo Consortium or looking to dive into Glo, this round is for you.

data.name: Gitcoin
data.description: Gitcoin creates solutions that empower digitally native communities to fund, build, and protect what matters.

questions.query: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.
How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation:
Bankless Academy contributes to the growth of the open-source software (OSS) ecosystem in several ways:

1. Partnerships with OSS Projects: Bankless Academy collaborates with other open-source projects in web3 to create its educational modules. This symbiotic relationship not only promotes these projects as they are part of the essential infrastructure of the app, but also provides a platform where users can learn about and get involved in them.

2. Hands-on Onboarding to Web3: the app serves as an educational gateway, introducing new users to decentralized technologies like Ethereum. By providing accessible, open content on how to navigate these systems, it helps users understand and adopt OSS tools and protocols and integrate them into their daily lives.

3. High focus on decentralization: the dApp educates about the principles of decentralization, empowering users to move away from centralized platforms and embrace OSS alternatives. This fosters a mindset of open participation and innovation, essential to expanding the OSS ecosystem

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation:
1. Ethereum Public Good: the dApp is an open, free educational resource that onboards users into web3, contributing to the Ethereum ecosystem by democratizing access to blockchain knowledge and empowering wider participation.

2. Interactive Learning Modules: the dApp provides a series of educational modules on topics like essential web3 concepts. These lessons are gamified and interactive, helping users learn by doing.

3. Quizzes and Certifications: each module includes knowledge checks or short quizzes, which users need to pass to demonstrate their knowledge. Upon completion, users receive NFT certificates as proof of their learning, showcasing their progress onchain, an building reputation through their Explorer profile.

4. Multi-Language Support: the platform is designed to be accessible to a global audience, offering lessons in multiple languages to lower barriers to entry for non-English speakers.

5. Open-Source and Collaborative: Bankless Academy leverages the open-source model by implementing open source tools as part of its infrastructure and by publishing its own code so that others can build upon it. Contributors can submit content suggestions to improve the content.

6. Real World Impact: professors have integrated the dApp as part o their students' curriculums, blockchain clubs use it for group learning, and digital communities are adding the dApp as a new step in their member/contributor journey.
    
Through these features, Bankless Academy distinguishes itself as a free, comprehensive, community-driven platform designed to educate and engage the next generation of web3 users and contributors.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation:
Our future development plans focus on high-impact initiatives. We will host a workshop and an onboarding booth at the "New to Web3? Start Here - Bangkok Edition," aimed at fostering direct user engagement and promoting open-source software, education, and contributions. 

We are expanding the integration and usage of the dApp within university and blockchain clubs across Europe, the US, and Africa, driving adoption through academic partnerships. 

After three years of development, the project will prioritize R&D of new open-source initiatives in Q1 and Q2 2025 for possible integrations and will implement critical product improvements guided by user research and testing. Grant funds will directly support these efforts, driving sustainable growth and enhancing our targeted global impact.

questions.query: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

data.name: ENS
data.description: The GG20 ENS Identity Round round is meant to support projects actively building on top of ENS. Any project that is growing, enhancing, or supporting the decentralized identity system around ENS is eligible.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation:
- Develop AI integration for the dApp plus Telegram and Discord bots
- New lessons and quests supporting the public goods ecosystem 
- Develop audio and video content to reach new audiences in web3 and web2 platforms
- More in-person workshops at upcoming Ethereum events
- Integration with university and blockchain clubs in Europe, Africa and the Americas
- Research & development efforts with high focus on innovation and product upgrades during 2025
